answers.answer: Try drinking some gatorade and lots of water for the headache and a tylenol if its really bad and pregnancy can mess with your vision hope this helps and you feel better soon!
Try taking you temperature to make sure you don't have fever

You need to get to the hospital immediately. Call your boyfriend home and if he refuses to take you to the hospital call an ambulance. These are signs of preeclampsia, a very serious condition. Not trying to scare you but visual disturbances, bad headaches, swelling of the hands/face, high blood pressure are symptoms and warning signs of preeclampsia. If not taken care of it could result in complications for you and your baby.

I had preeclampsia and these were my symptoms. When I got to the hospital my blood pressure was 198/102. Extremely high. They induced me right away because I was so far along. If you are still early in your pregnancy they will give you medication and put you on strict bed rest until you are ready to deliver or until your preeclampsia subsides which it doesn't until you deliver.

You didn't drink water your entire pregnancy????  Yes that can be a very big reason for your headache it's unhealthy for you and the baby you could be dehydrated....
Either you have preeclampsia or you're severely dehydrated. Either way you will have to go to the hospital.
